item.title: Outside the old Cambridge job centre, 26th July
item.description:
The building on the side of the road is covered in graffiti. It is also now unsecured and causing danger to the public after the recent fire. It is both dangerous and a complete eyesore.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Avenue, London

item.title: Bins left or the pavement for YEARS, 26th July
item.description:

item.title: Bins permanently left on the pavement, 26th July
item.description:
